nodes.bodyText: Do we still need this since we now use the cdr context instead? Looks like we no longer use this anywhere in the UI, not sure about API.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -108,11 +108,11 @@
     "useNewShibbolethService": true,
     "enableResearchPurposePrompt": false,
     "enableCohortBuilderV2": true,
-    "enableConceptSetSearchV2": false,
+    "enableConceptSetSearchV2": true,
     "enableReportingUploadCron": true,
-    "enableCOPESurvey": false,
+    "enableCOPESurvey": true,

nodes.bodyText: You may be correct, but i say we leave it for now. We have several large cleanup task after all the new features are turned on in prod, so we can just clean it up then.
